attributes.action: The Queens Golden Jubilee (QGJM) qualification criteria be expanded to include those members of HM Forces and Emergency Services who had completed 5 years or more service during the reign of ERII anytime before 6th February 2002.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Golden Jubilee Medal - current criteria: eligible individuals must have still been in the service with five years reckonable service on 6th February 2002 - the 50th Anniversary of the Queen's Accession.
We believe this is a snub to many veterans of all services who gave many valuable years to the Crown and should be treated equally to those serving on the exact Accession date.
